system.description:
Artificers can only cast this spell on constructs. This is treated as a touch attack (i.e., if successfully cast, add +2 to the result and compare against the target's Parry to see if you hit): if you hit, the construct suffers 2d10 damage.
 Alchemists prepare this spell as a vial containing an explosive concoction. The vial can be thrown with a range of 6/12/24, exploding on impact and filling an area the size of a Small Burst Template. Those within the area can attempt to evade with an Agility roll at -2, on a failure they suffer 2d10 damage.
